item.description:
We've been practicing the law of attraction and wonderful things have been flowing to us. We want this positive collective consciousness to grow!

The Law of Attraction states that for desires to manifest, you need to allow them by being in a positive vibrational alignment with your desire (have no conflicting feelings about it) and in a "feeling good" state. This will be the focus of the group, and explains our name -"Good Vibrations".

For our first meeting, we'll have at least one process and one guided meditation to help you in the above ways. There will also be time for open discussion and group coaching to help you with a particular challenge you might be experiencing and want to change.

Please join us in supporting one another in being able to be, do and have all that we desire!

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Metro West Law of Attraction - "Good Vibrations" Meetup
